author: bodewig
msg: This new framework should ease development of tasks that need to
<exec> now invokes ExecTask, a reimplementation of Exec that uses the
new framework but has some additional features.

author: conor
msg: This class loader allows a Java task to be run with a separate classpath
without requiring a new java instance to be created.
